#include<stdio.h>


int main()
{
    int t;
    
    unsigned int ways[1001];
    unsigned int way[50];
    unsigned int m,n,i,j,k,K;
    
    scanf("%d",&t);
    for(i=0;i<t;i++)
    {
       scanf("%u%u%u",&m,&n,&K);
       
       for(j=0;j<=m;j++)
        ways[j]=1;
       
       for(j=1;j<=n;j++)
        for(k=1;k<=m;k++)
         ways[k]=(ways[k]%K+ways[k-1]%K)%K;
        
       way[i]=ways[m];
    }
    for(i=0;i<t;i++)
     printf("\n%u",way[i]);
    
    return 0;
}
